verses.verse: We are <S%G3784>bound<s%> to <S%G3842>always<s%> give <S%G2168>thanks<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> even <S%G2531>as<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G514>appropriate,<s%> because <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> grows <S%G5232>exceedingly,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G1519>towards<s%> one <S%G240>another<s%> <S%G4121>abounds;<s%>

so <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G2248>we<s%> <S%G846>ourselves<s%> <S%G2744>boast<s%> <S%G1722>about<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1577>assemblies<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5281>patience<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1375>persecutions<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> in the <S%G2347>afflictions<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G430>endure.<s%>

This is an obvious <S%G1730>sign<s%> of the <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> to the end <S%G1519>that<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> may be counted <S%G2661>worthy<s%> of the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3958>you<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3958>suffer.<s%>
<S%G1512>Since<s%> it is a righteous <S%G1342>thing<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> to <S%G467>repay<s%> <S%G2347>affliction<s%> to those who <S%G2346>afflict<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> to give <S%G425>relief<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> who are <S%G2346>afflicted<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G2257>us,<s%> <S%G1722>when<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> is <S%G602>revealed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1411>mighty<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5395>flaming<s%> <S%G4442>fire,<s%>

<S%G1325>giving<s%> <S%G1557>vengeance<s%> to those who <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to those who <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G5219>obey<s%> the Good <S%G2098>News<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%>

<S%G3748>who<s%> will pay the <S%G5099>penalty:<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G3639>destruction<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G4383>face<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2479>might,<s%>

<S%G3752>when<s%> he <S%G2064>comes<s%> to be <S%G1740>glorified<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G40>saints,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to be <S%G2296>admired<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> those who have <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G3754>(because<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3142>testimony<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> was <S%G4100>believed<s%>) <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>

To <S%G1519>this<s%> end we <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4336>pray<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> may <S%G515>count<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G515>worthy<s%> <S%G2821>of<s%> your <S%G2821>calling,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4137>fulfill<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> desire <S%G19>of<s%> <S%G19>goodness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G19>of<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G1411>power;<s%>

<S%G3704>that<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> may be <S%G1740>glorified<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
